name: Rowing
description:
Manage a rowers team, give them a rhythm and lead to win!

This is a physics-based racing game when you help your team pass a track with obstacles and other teams. You have full control of every move.

Controls

Right Mouse Click - rowers from all sides pull the oars.

Left Mouse Click - rowers from one side pull oars, depends on the mouse position relative to a boat.

Notes

Take a look, a desktop version doesn't have a menu, so to quit the game just press Alt + F4. Any feedback or suggestions is very welcome ;)
